views.markdown:
Version: 1.7.5 - Proper code to certain features Version 1.7.4: Fix crash on iOS 5 Version: 1.7-3
- FrontFlash workaround is no longer need for iPad running iOS 9
Version: 1.7-2
- Fix preferences loading bug


Version: 1.7-1
- Revamped preferences page (Cephei)
- Improved color picker
- No longer support iOS 4


Version: 1.6-9
- Fix flash mode resetting to Auto for some iOS versions
- Fix description in preferences page
Version: 1.6-7 - Excess code removed Version: 1.6-6
- Fix crash when select flash color

Version: 1.6-5
- Fix flash bug in iOS 9

Version: 1.6-4
- Fix flash cool down bug in iOS 9

Version: 1.6-3
- iOS 9 support
Version: 1.6-1
- Fix some crashes.
Version: 1.5-3
- Clean up.
Version: 1.5-2
- Fix crash in iOS 7.0

Version: 1.5-1
- Numerous bugs fixed and improvement, including iOS 8 support.

Version: 1.4-4
- Fix crashing in video mode. (iOS 8)
- Fix FrontFlash not working in video mode. (iOS 7 & 8)

Version: 1.4-3
- Fix crashing in iOS 8 camera.
Version: 1.4-2
- Fixed screen flash loop condition when using timer mode of CameraTweak 2. (Tested in iOS 7)
Version: 1.4-1
- Replaced those RGB sliders with color picker. (NKO color picker, MIT license)
- Some bugs fixed and improvement.
- Initial iOS 8 support.
Version: 1.3-14
- Minor update for iOS 7.1.x
Version: 1.3-13
- Fixed white screen freezing issue. (iOS 7)
Version: 1.3-10
- Some code reduced.
Version: 1.3-9
- Improvement for iPad. (iOS 7)
Version: 1.3-8
- Fixed top bar UI bug in video mode. (iOS 7)
Version: 1.3-7
- Fixed compatibility with iPad running iOS 7

Version: 1.3-4
- Bugs fixed and improvement.

Version: 1.3-3
- Supported iOS 7.0 - 7.1
- 64-bit Library included
Version: 1.3-2
- Performance improved.
NOTE: I'm working for iOS 7 supported, stay tuned. :)
Version: 1.3-1
- Icon looks better.
- You can now set the flash view opacity from Settings.
- No more alert view when set flash mode to Auto, move along to Settings.
Version: 1.2-9
- Prevent flash mode from being off when start video capture in iDevices without LED-flash.

Version: 1.2-8
- Supported BiteSMS. ;)
- Compatible with iOS 4.
- Icon is brighter.
Version: 1.2-7
- Works in iMessages app.

Version 1.2-6
- Bug fixed when user capture still image while recording video using back-facing-camera and flash button shows up in iDevices without LED-flash.
Version: 1.2-5
- Fixed some bug

Version 1.2-4
- Faster flash duration.

Version 1.2-3
- Better compatibility.
- Deb sizes reduced.
Version 1.2-2
- Updated methods to be supported with iOS 5.0.x

Version 1.2-1
- Compatible with iOS 5.
- Compatible with Still Capture Enabler 2 version 1.7-2+
Version 1.1-8
- Alert (when set flash mode to Auto) now displays correctly.

Version 1.1-7
- Better compatibility for iDevices without LED-flash.
- Fixed flash button hides when start video recording.
Version 1.1-6
- Code optimization.
Version 1.1-4
- Resolved some bugs.
- Only iDevices with Front-Facing Camera can have this tweak installed.
Version 1.1-3
- Fixed tweak not working in Video mode, Sorry, my fail !

Version 1.1-2
- Some bugs fixed.

Version 1.1-1
- FrontFlash is enabled by default.
- Updated description.
- Add options to change Flash color, including
-> White
-> Warm
-> Cool
-> Custom
